text: Arnold Charlesworth (6 July 1930 – 1972) is an English former professional footballer who played as an inside forward in the Football League for York City, in non-League football for Boston United and Grantham, and was on the books of West Bromwich Albion and Rotherham United without making a league appearance. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:Sportspeople from Sheffield Category:1972 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Boston United F.C. players Category:West Bromwich Albion F.C. players Category:Rotherham United F.C. players Category:York City F.C. players Category:Grantham Town F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Midland Football League players
title: Arnold Charlesworth
